# Code of Conduct

This repository is dedicated to open, transparent, and safe research.

## Safety First

- All code is open source and reviewable
- No malicious operations
- No system modifications
- No hidden functionality

## Transparency

- All scripts are human-readable
- No obfuscation or encryption
- All operations are documented
- All outputs are verifiable

## Respect

- Be respectful in discussions
- Report security concerns responsibly
- Help improve the repository
- Share findings openly
